publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 114
ab.l: Čyḥqanda Jiš́raʾeĺ Micrid́ań juv́u Jaʿaqovnun čeja juźĺu ulustan.
Boldu Juhuda aziź ulusḥa Jiš́raʾeĺ erkĺańmiš ulusḥa.
Ol t́eńgiź ḱord́u da qacty ol Jard́eń qajyryldy artḥary.
Ol tavlar sekirdiĺar oĺeńĺar kibik qajalar qoj balalary kibik.
Ńe saja ol t́eńgiź ki qačasyn ol Jard́eń ki qajyrylasyn artḥary.
Ol tavlar sekirǵalejdirĺar oĺeń- ĺar kibik qajalar qoj balalary kibik.
Alnyndan bijniń qaltraɣyn jer alnynda Teńrisiniń Jaʿaqovnun.
Ol č́uv́uŕuv́č́u sqalany aɣyn suvlarɣa qajany ḱoź suvlarɣa.
